sources.title: Dog in a Mansion (1940)
sources.description: A depiction of the life of a pampered dog belonging to a rich family. It gets egg-shampoos and all sorts of other annoying indignities heaped upon its shoulders when it had rather be outside digging in the dirt. It gets loose and invites various kinds of gutter and mongrel dogs into the mansion. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/dog-in-a-mansion-1940/

metadata.Plot: A depiction of the life of a pampered dog belonging to a rich family. It gets egg-shampoos and all sorts of other annoying indignities heaped upon its shoulders when it had rather be outside digging in the dirt. It gets loose and invites various kinds of gutter and mongrel dogs into the mansion.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
